stories.title: Year Selection in Date Picker
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a year from the dropdown so that I can navigate to the required year easily

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the date picker is open, When the user clicks on the year dropdown, Then a list of years should be visible
Given the year list is visible, When the user selects a year, Then the date picker should update to display the selected year
